field.name: numOfLinksToDisplay
field.label: Number of listings under top level cats.
field.description: The number of listings to be shown under each top level categories

field.name: displayIndexCatCount
field.label: Show categories count
field.description: Setting this to Yes, will show the total number of categories besides all top level categories in index.

field.name: displayIndexListingCount
field.label: Show listings count
field.description: Setting this to 'Yes' will show the total number of listings besides all top level categories in index.

field.name: displayCatDesc
field.label: Show category's description
field.description: Setting this to 'Yes' will show each categories' description underneath their header in Index page.

field.name: displayAlphaIndex
field.label: Show Alpha Index
field.description: Alpba Index shows a list of alphabets on top of the Index page to provide quick access to listings and categories that starts with a specific alphabet.

field.name: displayIndexCatImage
field.label: Show Categories' images
field.description: Setting this to 'Yes' will show top level categories' images (when available) beside their name.

field.name: skipFirstImage
field.label: Skip the first image
field.description: By default, the first ordered image is used as the thumbnail and main graphical representative of a listing. Setting this option to 'Yes', will skip this first image and show second image and onwards in listing details page.

field.name: showBigImage
field.label: Show big image
field.description: Setting this to 'Yes' will display a listing's first image in medium sized, while others are shown in small/thumbnail size.

field.name: limitDetailsViewToRegistered
field.label: Limit details view to Registered users

field.name: listingNameLink
field.label: Listing Name's link destination
field.description: By default, clicking listing name in summary view bring user to the listing's details page. This parameter allow you to disable the link or forward the link to the listing's website. If you're forwarding the listing to a website, make sure you set the website field as a required field.

field.name: numOfColumnsInDetailsView
field.label: Custom field columns
field.description: The number of columns used to display custom fields' data in details view.

field.name: useFeaturedHighlight
field.label: Highlight featured listing
field.description: Using highlight will display a border and a different background color to a featured listing in summary view.

field.name: numOfListingColumnsInSummaryView
field.label: Listing columns
field.description: The number of columns used to display listings in summary view.

field.name: numOfColumnsInSummaryView
field.label: Custom field columns
field.description: The number of columns used to display custom fields' data in summary view.

field.name: showActionLinksInSummary
field.label: Show action links
field.description: Setting this to 'Yes' will show action links in summary view. eg: Submit Review, Recommend, Print, Contact Owner, Visit, Report, Owner's Listing & Map.

field.name: showImageInSummary
field.label: Show image
field.description: Setting this to 'Yes', will show the listing's first image in summary view.

field.name: showFillerImage
field.label: Show filler images
field.description: When set to 'Yes', filler image is shown in summary view when there are no images uploaded to listings.

field.name: onlyShowRootLevelCatInListalpha
field.label: Only show root level category in listalpha
field.description: If you have a large number of categories, turning on this feature will decrease the number of categories shown in listalpha by only showing root level categories.

field.name: displayAddressInOneRow
field.label: Show address related fields in one row
field.description: In order for this feature to work properly, you need to publish the 'Address' field.
